data.name: Benefits
data.value: Benefits

data.name: COdescription
data.value: Description

data.name: Dmsj1
data.value: Measures of Laboral Climate allows you to set strategies that optimize productive behavior in employees, helping the employees to work enthusiastically and effectively. The results that you could obtain trough this kind of assessment, allow you to understand the actions and reactions of employees in their work environment, as well as their responsibility, commitment, productivity and respect for the rules and policies of the company.

data.name: Dmsj2
data.value: Recently, Perez de Maldonado (2004) argues that the work environment or organizational environment can be understood as a "socially constructed phenomenon, arising from individual-group interactions- laboral conditions, and results in a meaningfully experience both individual and as a group, because what belongs and occurs in the organization affects and interacts with everything in it. Laboral Climate are precisely the result of these interactions, that occur in a dynamic, changing and emotional way".

data.name: E360msj1
data.value: The 360º assessment is a technique that is increasingly used in modern companies. Also known as integrated assessment, it aims to provide employees with an overview of its performance as reliable as possible, obtaining information from all possible points of view, including managers, colleagues, internal and external customers and subordinates.

data.name: E360msj2
data.value: The goal of this integrated assessment is to provide the employee or the company full and objective feedback, necessary to take the actions in order to improve employee performance in his workplace.

data.name: E360msj3
data.value: Through its enforcement, we could obtain invaluable information for the Human Resources department, as it provides the guide to actions to be taken in short, medium and long term.

data.name: E360msj4
data.value: It helps you to determine the performance of each of the evaluated according to the competencies, skills and behaviors that are important for the company.

data.name: E360msj5
data.value: Identifies individual skill levels in different areas.

data.name: E360msj6
data.value: Makes it possible to undertake specific actions to improve and develop the employees’ performance.

data.name: E360msj7
data.value: Finally, this evaluation benefits human development, producing a positive impact on the progress of the company, increasing the effective actions and working performance. At the end of the day, you will get a significance increase in quality of products or services offered by the company.

data.name: ENDmsj1
data.value: Lately there has been a important increase in the competencies investigation, which has provided significant contributions to the business field, associated largely with the develop and optimization of Human Resources processes. Competencies are individual underlying factors, which are related to a number of skills, behavioral tendencies, knowledge and attitudes that explains the effective and successful performance in work environment.

data.name: ENDmsj2
data.value:
Its features are:
1. They are permanent.
2. They find its way out when the employees execute a task related with their job.
3. They actually caused the work performance, not only are related with it.
4. They show themselves up in several activities.

data.name: ENDmsj3
data.value: The possibility to diagnose competencies in a company, implies the possibility to know which behaviors, attitudes and skills are required to be successful as a employee in it, providing the necessary information to create the different job profiles to the Human Resources department. Likewise it allows them to make the correct matches position-employee, according with the competencies related with each position.

data.name: ENDmsj4
data.value: In addition, the correct competencies diagnose allows you to design developing plans to your employees, in order to increase their competencies level when they are very low or nonexistent.

data.name: ENDTitle
data.value: Competencies Assessment (Assessment Centres)

data.name: Items
data.value: Specifically, applying a measurement of Laboral Climate, allows companies to:

data.name: Path
data.value: Services

data.name: Subitem1
data.value: Identify strengths and weaknesses in the work environment.

data.name: Subitem2
data.value: Have qualitative and quantitative indicators of the main processes and human management variables.

data.name: Subitem3
data.value: Identifiy critical points that require priority attention.

data.name: Subitem4
data.value: Identify the focus of the weaknesses that the organization can present

data.name: Subitem5
data.value: Establish improvement and action plans.

data.name: Text1
data.value: We provide a wide variety of specialized services in organizational and business consulting, based on the real needs of our clients. The results of the evaluations, measurements and investigations are generated on a Web page, guaranteeing the security, saving paper and confidentiality of the information collected.

data.name: Text2
data.value: Currently, we offer the following services:
